about_the_game:
Description:
Indulge in a scintillating and unforgettable experience with "HOT MAGIC SAUSAGE," an exhilarating visual novel that will leave you craving for more. Dive into a tale of friendship, temptation, and supernatural lust that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

Join two old friends as they gather for a barbecue in their backyard, seeking nothing more than a night of camaraderie and relaxation. Little do they know, their innocent gathering is about to take a dark and twisted turn.

Adjacent to them are two alluring beauties, the new neighbors who have recently moved into the area. What begins as a casual encounter quickly escalates into a night of debauchery when the old friends decide to sample an unusual sausage brought by one of them.

Upon consuming this mysterious sausage, the old friends undergo a shocking transformation, morphing into insatiable monsters driven by primal desire. Their unquenchable lust knows no bounds, and the new neighbors soon find themselves at the mercy of their uncontrollable appetites.

Key Features:


  • HD Renders: Immerse yourself in stunning high-definition renders that bring the characters and environments to life.
  • Intriguing Story: Unravel a captivating narrative filled with twists, turns, and unexpected revelations that will keep you guessing until the very end.
  • Explicit Scenes: Experience pulse-pounding encounters and explicit moments of passion that push the boundaries of desire and temptation.
  • Awesome Soundtrack: Groove to the beat of a cool soundtrack that sets the mood and enhances the atmosphere of the game.
  • One-Handed Gameplay: With its intuitive controls and streamlined mechanics, "HOT MAGIC SAUSAGE" can be played with ease using just one hand, allowing you to fully immerse yourself in the experience.

highlighted.name: Take off all the unnecessary clothes

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work.
The game contains sexual content: sexual caracters, sexual acts, sexual violence, sexual assault/non-consensual sex.
It does not contains  drug/alcohol abuse, self-harm, or suicide.
All characters are over the age of 20.

detailed_description:

Indulge in a scintillating and unforgettable experience with "HOT MAGIC SAUSAGE," an exhilarating visual novel that will leave you craving for more. Dive into a tale of friendship, temptation, and supernatural lust that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

Join two old friends as they gather for a barbecue in their backyard, seeking nothing more than a night of camaraderie and relaxation. Little do they know, their innocent gathering is about to take a dark and twisted turn.

Adjacent to them are two alluring beauties, the new neighbors who have recently moved into the area. What begins as a casual encounter quickly escalates into a night of debauchery when the old friends decide to sample an unusual sausage brought by one of them.

Upon consuming this mysterious sausage, the old friends undergo a shocking transformation, morphing into insatiable monsters driven by primal desire. Their unquenchable lust knows no bounds, and the new neighbors soon find themselves at the mercy of their uncontrollable appetites.

  • HD Renders: Immerse yourself in stunning high-definition renders that bring the characters and environments to life.
  • Intriguing Story: Unravel a captivating narrative filled with twists, turns, and unexpected revelations that will keep you guessing until the very end.

legal_notice: Legal Information: All images and artworks featured in the game are objects of intellectual property and are protected by copyright. The developer holds full and exclusive rights to commercially utilize the aforementioned artworks provided by the artist, within the context of creating and distributing this game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS or Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version 10.11+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: HOT MAGIC SAUSAGE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Two old friends were making barbecue. Next to them were two sexy babes who recently moved here. Having eaten a piece of unusual sausages, the case takes an unexpected turn.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Japanese
